content.rendered: The High School Counseling office is excited to inform you about the upcoming Class of 2026 SUNY Adirondack Direct Admissions Event, which will take place on Tuesday, November 18, at 10:30 AM in the high school auditorium. During this event, our students will have the opportunity to receive direct admission to SUNY Adirondack and learn more about the various programs available to them. Representatives from the college will be present, to guide students through the next steps in the admission process. For any student who requests to opt out the event, they must contact the counseling office by November 1.
